vacants.vacantDescription: We are looking for a Java Developer to join our team and support internal software development projects. You will work on maintaining and improving existing applications and collaborate with cross-functional teams.
vacants.requirements: Looking for a professional with solid knowledge of Java, intermediate English skills, ability to work in a team, and interest in developing high-quality software solutions.

vacants.vacantDescription: We are seeking a frontend developer with experience in modern interfaces, state management, and API consumption.
vacants.requirements: Strong experience in frontend development, ability to work with modern frameworks, understanding of UI/UX best practices, and collaborative work in an agile team.

vacants.vacantDescription: Company focused on enterprise solutions requires a backend developer for API development and maintenance.
vacants.requirements: Advanced knowledge in API development, database management, experience with agile methodologies, and ability to work on scalable software projects.

vacants.vacantDescription: We are looking for a full stack developer to work on international projects with agile methodologies.
vacants.requirements: Experience in full application development, ability to integrate frontend and backend, knowledge of containers and deployment, and adherence to software development best practices.

vacants.vacantDescription: Ideal position for students or recent graduates looking to start their career in web development.
vacants.requirements: Willingness to learn and develop professionally, basic understanding of web development, ability to work in a team, and eagerness to grow in an agile environment.

vacants.vacantDescription: Responsible for ensuring software quality through manual and automated testing.
vacants.requirements: Ability to design and execute test plans, effectively identify defects, document results, and collaborate with development teams to ensure software quality.

vacants.vacantDescription: Development of cross-platform mobile applications for national and international clients.
vacants.requirements: Experience in mobile application development, understanding of cross-platform frameworks, adherence to programming best practices, and ability to deliver quality solutions on time.
